item.title: About
item.description:
I am the principal scientist working at Course5 AI Lab, currently focused on natural language generation and understanding. I lead a team developing the business intelligence bot Persia. Persia analyzes users’ questions automatically and provides tailored responses based on a combination of database search and data analysis. My main interest is in researching and developing fast, versatile and easily deployable deep learning models. For more information, please see my CV.

Â 

I run this blog not only to refresh my memory about machine learning and knowledge, but also to improve my presentation skills and to help as much as I can my friends who are also on this path.
